description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Divide your character into two independently controlled characters with Divided ”A genuinely unique and mind boggling platform game“ Divided will take you into beautifully crafted levels that are designed to test your reactions  and brain power. If you get stuck splitting your brain in two then get a friend to join in with an easy drop in co-op system and tag team the wide variety of puzzles
